description: It doesn't get any easier than this 10-minute chicken salad recipe. There's no cooking required thanks to a store-bought roast chicken.
name: Chicken & Crispy Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Scatter remaining noodles over salad, garnish with coriander leaves and serve with remaining dressing.
